title: Militants strike Afghan ministry in deadly attack
text:
Militants strike Afghan ministry in deadly attack 9:09am EDT - 01:03
Gunmen armed with assault rifles and grenade launchers stormed the heavily fortified headquarters of the Afghan interior ministry on Wednesday, battling security forces for more than two hours in the latest attack on the capital Kabul. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Gunmen armed with assault rifles and grenade launchers stormed the heavily fortified headquarters of the Afghan interior ministry on Wednesday, battling security forces for more than two hours in the latest attack on the capital Kabul.
